author: norwayfish
content: In the lingo of eth client devs, does consensus algorithm refer to the forkchoice algo usually? so POW is really heaviest chain choice + certain validity rules for the blockchain tree itself right? Calling POW a consensus algo is a little inaccurate to my understanding?

author: gakonst
content: PoW is just the sybil resistance mech, the forkchoice & the process by which you agree on the forkchoice is what defines the consensus, you can do PoS heaviest chain (which is part of Ethereum's consensus also)
